system.description: Amber is a gemstone with a warm, golden-orange hue, often containing natural inclusions or bubbles. It has a smooth, polished surface and a unique texture as it is formed from fossilized tree resin. Amber's rich color and transparency make it highly valued for jewelry and decorative items.
